title: Jeffrey Epstein victim claims to have sex tapes he made of certain  friends with underage girls
description:
The world is full of great mysteries. Why is the sky blue? Who created the platypus? And who are all the famous friends convicted pedophile Jeffrey Epstein provided underage girls to for them to sex up? Epstein knew, and critics say he killed himself. Epstein's pimp knew, and critics say that he too killed himself. Epstein's top b*tch Ghislaine Maxwell knows, and she's living her best life in prison while her client list remains unknown and no one in the press is curious enough to ask.

Now thanks to an unsealed email, there are clues! Alleged victim Sarah Ransome claims to have videos Epstein made of his friends having sex with minors, and that the videos are stashed somewhere in Europe. (shout out to Not the Bee).

From the redacted emails:

  • "When my friend had sexual intercourse with [redacted] and [redacted], sex tapes were in fact filmed on each occasion by Jeffrey."
  • "Thank God she managed to get ahold of some footage of the filmed sex tapes which clearly identify the faces of [redacted] and [redacted] having sexual intercourse with her."
  • "I will be more than willing to swear under oath and testify in court over these sex tapes.

The lingering question is who the redacteds are. It could be anyone Epstein was associated with.

On a totally unrelated note, Bill Gates was good friends with Jeffrey Epstein. Prince Andrew was also a friend of Epstein's.

Bill Clinton was not only friends with Epstein, but the prominent Democrat donor would visit the president at the White House AND bring women along with him allegedly.

The world may never know who the redactd names are.

title: Trans teacher with ginormous fake breasts sneaks into children's dance recital, asked to leave by parents
description:
We've been having fun with the Kayla Lemieux story. There isn't a better example of the absurd things we are expected to tolerate in the name of tolerance than a female teacher who used to be a man, decided he's a woman, and parading around high school students with size Z chesticles and equally fake rock-hard nipples. But the rumors that s/he is a massive troll job are becoming more believable.

The latest story from the Daily Mail is that Kayla snuck into a children's dance recital inconspicuously. This is her being inconspicuous.

Lemieux sat in the front row watching the children dancing on stage. Eventually, she was confronted by concerned parents and asked to leave as she did not have a child involved in the show.

It's not that she snuck into the dance recital. It's not that parents confronted Kayla and told them to leave. It's that the incident took place in 2021... and we're only hearing about it now. The initial video that turned Kayla into the social media content ingénue her beautiful and brave self has become didn't go viral until September of 2022. And then each story since has gotten more ridiculous than the one before.

Last fall, the anon boards started to report the teacher -- when identifying as a male -- was almost fired for "toxic masculinity" and would tell his shop class of impressional young boys how silly the idea of things like gender-neutral bathrooms is. That wasn't redpilling enough, so "Kayla" was born.

He's now upping the ante to exploit the very clown world the school and society itself has created. His long game is most likely to get fired, then sue for discrimination.

The fact that America didn't learn of this Canadian import for a year is questionable. We might be a far superior country, but we all share the same internet. If Kayla is a based dude playing the long con, hats off to him(?). Though the only thing left would be for Kayla to pose in a bikini.

If not, then the Canadian public school system manages to be worse than what we have in America. And you should all be ashamed of yourself.

title: Taylor Lorenz got herself suspended by Twitter. No one knows why and we're all laughing too hard to care
description:
Forty-ish-year-old (allegedly) tech blogger Taylor Lorenz has gotten herself yeeted off of Twitter. The Washington Post journalismer known for doxxing people who have a different opinion than her, and not only going after them but going after their children as well, has become a controversial media figure. Also, a gross person. One critic says of the WaPo content creator: "I am a half crippled, fat, balding, internet shitposter, and still more likeable then you."

Anyway, she gone.

Taylor Lorenz finally got suspended for all the awful things she's done https://t.co/Bmg9NXRoh6
— Tim Pool (@Timcast) December 18, 2022

"Tay Tay," as she's known by her stans and by people mocking her, took to Instagram to break the news and claim without evidence she doesn't know why she was suspended. Then she was hit with the sudden realization that she might be the baddie.

Taylor Lorenz abruptly ends her live TikTok steam after seeing the comments pic.twitter.com/FV1APBkslb
— End Wokeness (@EndWokeness) December 18, 2022

In Tay Tay's defense, as of this writing, it is unclear as to WHY she was suspended. There are only two things you can do to get suspended on Elon Musk's Twitter. One is doxxing, which is Lorenz's love language.

I’m not famous and I wasn’t a public figure either when Taylor Lorenz asked for my address, said it wasn’t for publication and then proceeded to dox me in the NYT with the address she had assured me she wasn’t going to publish. The article was shared many x on Twitter. @elonmusk https://t.co/dsqYai2KNn pic.twitter.com/0t80xTCuhd
— Ariadna Jacob (@littlemissjacob) December 16, 2022

The other is antisemitism, as we have seen with the Yeeting of Ye. As reported by the Washington Free Beacon, Lorenz launched an anti-Semitic tirade against reporter Bari Weiss: "Weiss also happens to be Jewish, and Lorenz's tweet was a textbook example of an anti-Semitic trope about how all Jews are rich and powerful, conniving, and immoral."

There is also Lorenz's pretty vendetta against citizen journalist Libs of Tik Tok, who also happens to be Jewish. From the Free Beacon:

Lorenz has a history of targeted harassment against Jews. Earlier this year, for example, she publicly identified—or "doxxed"—the anonymous woman behind the popular Twitter account "Libs of TikTok." Doxxing is an explicit endorsement of physical violence. The woman who operates the account is Jewish.

Is there a criticism to be made of Elon Musk that suspending journalismers is wrong and goes against what Musk says Twitter's free speech mission is? Sure, why not. If you take Twitter seriously, such hypocrisy might bother you. The rest of us are laughing too hard to care.

So... professional doxxer Taylor Lorenz got suspended.

I feel just horrible about this.
— Jeff Charles, Destroyer of Democracy (@JeffOnTheRight) December 18, 2022


🚨BREAKING🚨

Taylor Lorenz and diarrhea are both trending at the same time. pic.twitter.com/pe6FW8MVB2
— Jason Jones (@jonesville) December 18, 2022


When Taylor Lorenz comes back in a few days, get ready for her describing her Twitter jail experience as if she were Nelson Mandela.

pic.twitter.com/qm7WmRvolk
— Wall Street Silver (@WallStreetSilv) December 18, 2022


🚨 BREAKING 🚨 Taylor Lorenz becomes the first non-journalist to be banned by @elonmusk.
— Ian Haworth (@ighaworth) December 18, 2022

On behalf of all of us here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website, we wish Taylor Lorenz the best in her future endeavors.
